about_the_game:
Hey there, fearless adventurers! Welcome to the wild bunch that is "Sleeping Forest"!

👉 Assemble Your Dream Team:
Imagine this: you're the hotshot leader of the "Sleeping Forest" mercenary group, and your team is as dynamic as a wizard at a disco. But guess what? It's not just these four legends; no sir, you're gonna be recruiting mercenaries along the way! Build your dream squad, and watch it grow like a happy garden of destruction.

🤔 No Room for the Faint of Heart:
Get ready to make decisions that'll make your granny blush! In the heat of battle, one wrong move, and BAM! Perma-death's knocking on your door. Every choice matters, but hey, that's what makes victory taste so sweet. Will you rise to the challenge or crumble like a cookie under pressure?

🌎 Fantasy World Extravaganza:
We're not in Kansas anymore—say hello to a medieval-fantasy mashup that's weirder than ... well its weird, trust me! Explore magical lands, encounter quirky creatures, and unlock the secrets of this world inspired by the coolest parts of our own history.

💘 Love in the Air (and Maybe Some Arrows):
Who said mercenaries can't catch feelings? Amidst the chaos, expect a dash of romance to spice up the battlefield. Forge bonds, make choices, and maybe, just maybe, find love in the weirdest places. Love and war, they say – let’s see if you can conquer both!

🕵️‍♀️ Puzzles and Investigations, Oh My!:
It's not all hack and slash – put that brain to work! Solve puzzles, unravel mysteries, and outsmart your enemies. It's like being a detective in armor, and trust us, nothing says "victory" like outwitting your foes.

👬 Party Time with Pals:
Grab your buds because "Sleeping Forest" supports local couch co-op multiplayer! Team up, laugh together, and probably argue over battle strategies. It's a party, and everyone's invited to this medieval-fantasy fiesta!

🏆 Buddy, Are You Up for the Challenge?:
So, ready to dive into "Sleeping Forest" and create your own legend? It's not just a game; it's a rollicking adventure filled with laughs, tears, and a sprinkle of magic. Gather your wits, recruit your squad, and let's turn this fantasy world upside down!

Adventure awaits, my friend. Let's make history together!
